thread.title: NC State Snap Counts 2025: Notre Dame
thread.title_full: NC State Snap Counts 2025: Notre Dame

author: R. Cory Smith
title: NC State Snap Counts 2025: Notre Dame
text:
RALEIGH, N.C. -- NC State moved to 4-3 (1-2 ACC) on the season after a blowout loss at Notre Dame by a final of 36-7 that included three turnovers and zero trips to the red zone. The Wolfpack struggled to get anything going on either side of the football, but .
Here's a look at the snap counts from the NC State staff following last Saturday's loss to the Irish.
Freshman Report: Will Wilson, Teddy Hoffmann, Spike Sowells Jr., Josiah Victor, Ke'Von Carter, LaCorian Hodge, Caden Gordon and Tristan Teasdell have all played above the four-game maximum for the Wolfpack, so they will no longer have a redshirt option. Adrian Farrow (3) and Preston Douglas (1) have all played in games, but retained the redshirt option.
